alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mobile County through 715 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chunchula to Grand Bay. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Chunchula, Axis, Mount Vernon, Semmes, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 158 and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
